import React, { Component } from "react" class Article extends Component{ render(){ const {article, toggleOpen} = this.props const titleStyle = { background: '#36a998', height: '60px', width: '100%', margin: '10px 0 0 0', padding: '0 50px', textAlign: 'center', border: 'none' } const titleStyle2 = { background: '#85aa36', height: '60px', width: '100%', margin: '10px 0 0 0', padding: '0 50px', textAlign: 'center', border: 'none' } return(
{ this.getBody() }
) } getBody(){ const {isOpen, article} = this.props if (!isOpen) return null return (

{article.location}

{article.text}

{article.members}

) } } export default Article
